map2loop.project

class map2loop.project.Project(loopdata_state=None, geology_file=None, fault_file=None, fold_file=None, structure_file=None, dtm_file=None, mindep_file=None, section_files=None, drillhole_file=None, dtb_grid_file=None, cover_map_file=None, metadata=None)

A high level object implementation of the map2loop workflow.

fetch_sources(bbox)

Fetch remote loop geospatial data and metadata.

Parameters

bbox (list) – 2D list of ints or floats describing the area of interest.

read_metadata(filename)

Helper function that turns json and hjson files into usable configuration dictionaries.

Parameters

filename (string) – Path or url to metadata file.

set_proj_defaults()

Set the bounds and projection of the input data to use if not explicitly provided.

update_workflow(model_engine)

Set unique run flags depending on model engine to tailor outputs.

Parameters

workflow (dict) – Dict containing desired engine to be updated with flags, defaults to {‘model_engine’: ‘loopstructural’}
